long_description: The Marin San Rafael DS2 hybrid bike features a comfortable upright riding position and a suspension fork that absorbs the bumps so you can relax and enjoy the ride. Lightweight 6061 aluminum frame is built to increase strength while offering weight savings; shaped seatstays and chainstays improve ride quality. Suntour NVX suspension fork features 63mm of travel; suspension locks when not needed or for more efficient hill climbing. Triple crankset and wide-ranging 11-32 cassette provide 24 gears for fun, swift cruising and easier spinning up hills. Shimano trigger shifters and derailleurs provide responsive, smooth shifting through all 24 gear combinations. Puncture-resistant Kenda Keen tires offer an efficient ride that rolls up to speed quickly. Marin San Rafael DS2 bike specs are subject to change.
short_description: The Marin San Rafael DS2 hybrid bike features a comfortable upright riding position and a suspension fork that absorbs the bumps so you can relax and enjoy the ride.
